name: FlamesFriend,Lover,Affection,Marriage,Enemy
0:
”Alexa ask flames match the status of jack and jill”
”open flames match”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flames match
des:
Through Alexa we bring to your living room (and at the proverbial tip of your tongue), the ability to find out the relationship status between any two people in the big-wide-world!

This is a highly advanced skill that is developed using an elaborate mix of the past, the present and the future.

Past: age old concept
Present: modern artificial intelligence. modern voice technology.
Future: the ability to accurately predict the relationship status of people using only their first names!

Non-Statutory Warning #1:
This is addictive.

Non-Statutory Warning #2:
Don't take the predictions seriously! (psst: alexa's good at predicting).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
